name: Mission Oskour: Human After All
description:
Your new space station launched a while ago and business is going well. Unfortunately, today you heard the alarms ring. A pack of angry Entoukas, a bloodthirsty alien race, is attacking your station!

You now have to manage your station and save your employees and guard robots. Think fast... 

If you decide to save your employees your karma will be good but what is a good conscience, if your business goes bankrupt?

You can decide to save your guard robots but who will work on your station, if you have no one left?

Be careful who you will sacrifice.... You can save money or save your humanity. The choice is now yours.

____________________

-Dilemme: Choix entre les employés et les robots.

-Arcade: Score et temps réel.

-Horreur: Invasion alien, gore.

-Gestion: Déplacement des personnages.
